description: Genetics?  Doesn't excuse not eating healthy, though.
I'd lie if I said this trait was worth a whole point.
You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.  DUMMIED OUT because it wasn't actually functional…
You recover from pain faster than normal.  DUMMIED OUT because it wasn't actually functional…
You recover from pain much faster than normal.  DUMMIED OUT because it wasn't actually functional…

You've been taught proper table manners from your early childhood on.  Now you can't even think about eating without a table.  Eating without it frustrates you, but eating like a civilized person gives you a bigger morale bonus.
